overview: Everyone loves Egg!  Egg is a super-cool barely-moving quality cartoon property dude with no feet and no face. Along with his trusty invisible sidekicks Druid Droid and Spirit Spork, Egg travels the galaxy looking for zany adventures with other quality cartoon properties. Who knows what crazy thing will happen next?  This is Egg's first screen test. Watch it over and over! New exciting adventures are coming soon!
title: Egg
